import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete All Sessions"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/auth/sessions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Invalidates all the user's active sessions.
This also invalidates all [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)s 
and [`RefreshToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#refresh-token)s.
Therefore, logging out the user from all devices.

You can learn more about sessions [here](../../docs/guides/auth/sessions).

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token) is required.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
